Flattering fitted shirt with long sleeves.  It really is wrinkle free after washing.  It has a good feel to it.  Great fit, I ordered Medium according to Zeagoo chart.  Sky blue is a rich blue.  The fabric is substantial and comfortable.  Not see thru.

I purchased the black in this shirt the week before. It fit well, so I ordered the white, as well. The size must be mislabeled. I ordered medium in both. This shirt looked ridiculous on, like I was wearing my husband’s shirt.

The only slight negative I would say is the "wine red" color is not as rich/dark as shown in the product image. It's a lighter color which is not exactly what I was hoping for. That being said, the overall quality of the shirt is great! The seams are well done with no loose stitching and the fabric is nice. The fit is perfect - as it's not just a typical boxy/collared shirt but has a nice tailoring that elevates the overall look. This blouse looks much more expensive than it is! Overall a great product!

Was wrinkle resistant even after washing. It was very flattering however the material was not what I was expecting. The cut was good and it was very lightweight, breathable and functional. I tucked it into my pants and looked very professional.

Nice quality but way too long for me.  Maybe I'm too short at 5'2" for the shirt.  I will have to shorten it before I can wear it.

评论概述: Nice shirt. Fit a tall ladies long arms.
评论详情: I’m 5’11” 168lbs and have long arms. Most long sleeves shirts are too short for me, this one is not. Ordered XL to make sure it fit in the shoulders and didn’t gap at the chest. It’s fits great! I might could have gotten by with a large but I don’t want to feel restricted or have the sleeves raise up too far when reaching. It looks professional and didn’t wrinkle much during wear. I washed in cold water and dried on low heat. It still had wrinkles from shipping but was easy to press them out. I used a low to medium iron setting with an ironing cloth on top of the shirt to make sure I didn’t scorch it because this shirt is 100% polyester. It will probably wash up nice without wrinkles the next time. Ironing on a very low heat may work without an ironing cloth, but I’d be careful. If you don’t have an ironing cloth a simple plain pillow case will work. Just use it between the iron and the shirt. Even though this shirt is polyester it doesn’t have that typical feel. It feels more like a somewhat thinner cotton broadcloth to me. After this one I went back and purchased 4 more in different colors.
The shirt is thin.
Very nice blouse. Great fitting.  Nice cotton fabric.  Can be casual or dressed up.
I loved the price and I loved the colors, but it was too small even after ordering 2 sizes larger than I normally wear. I had to return it.
....and simply not suitable for a ladies work shirt. Reminds me of something a mechanic's jumper would be made of..

My wife is working in the office a lot more these days and needed some nicer tops. This has been an instant favorite. The color is very deep and rich maybe slightly brighter than the picture but only slightly. It falls well on her and she loves the fit of it. She looks great in it and very professional. She pairs this with a light blazer.
Such a lovely shade of green.  The shirt fit in the bust, but the sleeves were too long and too billowy under the arms.  Unfortunately I have to send it back.
Fits very nice.  Kinda has a stretch to the material.

评论概述: Women's button down shirt with long sleeves
评论详情: I ordered this Zeagoo brand women's button down shirt with long sleeves top for myself. I ordered the wine red in an XXL. The color looks like it has a little more rust color than a pure wine red but it's pretty.  When the shirt arrived, it was really stiff. I washed it once and it was still a little stiff, but after the second wash it was fine. I hung this shirt to dry because it was a little snug in the bust.  I ordered the size is according to the size chart but it was snug in the bust. I normally wear a size XXL and have a 48 inch bust. It seems the shirt runs just a little small in the bust. It's nice with jeans and works well as with a top underneath.  If you're looking for something a little on the dressier side, maybe for casual Friday's, this top is a good choice.  Recommended.
Great value. Great fit. Well made.

This is a nice basic work blouse.

评论概述: Blouse had damage that was hard to see
评论详情: When I received this we were having very hot weather so I did not wash it and dry it within the return. It was finally cool enough to wear it this week and I put it on only to  discover it had damage that was very hard to see because of the stripe pattern. It looked like it had been sliced with a box cutter, but right along the edge of the stripes. It also was very wrinkled after washing it. Maybe the wrinkle resistance kicks in after a few washings. I was really disappointed by this because the fabric had a nice feel, not too thin, and the color is very pretty.. If you order it, check it with care as soon as you receive it for any hard-to-see damage.

评论概述: I love the vertical lines and the quality of the facric
评论详情: This is a cute shirt with 7 front buttons, plus one for each cuff, it is good quality fabric, and runs true to size.  Sewing is good and those vertical lines make me look so much thinner.  I washed it in cold water and hung it to dry and it still needed ironing.

I received the blue and white stripe top and I like how it looks. The material is matte, not shiny, but it does not breath so best for colder weather in my opinion.  The Large fits me well - I’m 5’8” and weigh 155. I have long arms and the sleeves fit nicely.  It arrived folded and with wrinkles so not exactly wrinkle free. I washed in cold water and hung to dry and still needed a minimal amount of ironing for my taste. Overall a nice top to throw on with some pants for a chic look especially for the price.

This is a beautiful shirt that will work with either casual or office attire. It looks like a cotton shirt, but is actually 100% polyester, which may make it a bit warm during the summer months. But the poly material gives the shirt a bit of sheen, which makes it look a little dressier. The cut of the shirt tapers a bit at the waist, then flares a bit at the bottom. The striping on the collar and back yolk are perpendicular to the rest of the shirt, which adds some style to the shirt. All-in-all, a nice shirt for work or play.
